dynamiclights.midnightconfig.title: Dynamic Lights Configuration
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.configure_i: §dℹ Info:§r§f To configure this data pack on a world-to-world basis,
join a world and execute the command §o/function dynamiclights:settings§r.
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.info: §dℹ Info:§r§f These settings will be applied to all worlds globally.
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.info2: Please make sure to rejoin any world for the global settings to take effect.
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.enable_glow: Entities with the glowing potion effect
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.enable_ghas: Ghasts about to shoot a fireball
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.enable_ench:
Default: §aYes§f
§6⚠ Note: This may lead to decreased performance of some mob farms.
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.enable_fire:
Default: §aYes§f
§6⚠ Note: This may lead to decreased performance of some mob farms.
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.enable_ript: Tridents enchanted with Riptide inside water

Default: §aYes§f
Only works when Water Sensitivity Check is enabled.
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.enable_chan: Tridents enchanted with Channeling during a thunderstorm
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.enable_wate:
Default: §aYes§f
If enabled, water sensitive items such as torches will turn off inside water.
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.enable_soun:
Default: §aYes§f
If enabled, sound cues play when a water sensitive item turns off or on.
dynamiclights.midnightconfig.enable_rain:
Default: §aYes§f
If enabled, touching rain counts as being inside water.
Only has an effect when Water Sensitivity Check is enabled.
Only for Minecraft 1.19.4+
modmenu.summaryTranslation.dynamiclights: Supported entities and items such as torches or lanterns emit light! Server-side only!
